abstract.t: Dynamic Policy Controllers like resource and admission control systems need to be able to locate media receivers in each segment of the network to determine the path of the media flows prior to allowing or rejecting the session setup. Current definitions of SDP are not clear about conveying a local identifier (e.g. private IP address) of the client that is destined to receive media streams after successful SDP negotiation. In this draft we explain the need for carrying such information over SDP and discuss a set of possible solutions.
